attributes.action: Make the provision of sanitary products for Women free
attributes.additional_details: http://menstrualhygieneday.org/zambia-government-provide-free-sanitary-napkins-rural-girls/ Zambian government is providing free basic sanitary care to rural females in order to retain attendance in education http://www.nhs.uk/Service-Search/Free%20condoms/LocationSearch/732 Location finder for free condoms. Nothing on NHS website about free sanitation products.
attributes.background: There is provision for free condoms, but one can abstain from sex, yet the provision of sanitary products for Women's periods is one that has no free supply, and a women is unable to abstain from her period.
